text: L. Q. Jones (born Justice Ellis McQueen Jr.; August 19, 1927 - July 9, 2022) was an American character actor and movie director. He was known for his roles in some movies directed by Sam Peckinpah.The New York TimesRogerebert.com He starred in The Wild Bunch, Hang 'Em High, Ride the High Country, Battle Cry, and in Casino. Jones died on July 9, 2022 at his home in Los Angeles, California at the age of 94.L.Q. Jones, Actor in Sam Peckinpah Classics and Director of ‘A Boy and His Dog,’ Dies at 94 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie directors Category:People from Beaumont, Texas Category:Actors from Texas
title: L. Q. Jones
